contact.description: Feel free to reach out for any inquiries or collaborations.

about.description: I offer personalized solutions that capture the essence of each project. From attractive websites to functional applications, my goal is to transform your ideas into digital realities, always focusing on usability and aesthetics.

card1.title: Development and Programming
card1.description: I cover everything from creating dynamic websites to custom applications, using modern technologies and best practices to ensure scalable and maintainable projects.

card2.title: UI User Interface
card2.description: I design intuitive and attractive user interfaces. My approach focuses on creating functional and pleasant interfaces, ensuring that every interaction is smooth and satisfying.

card3.title: UX User Experience
card3.description: I focus on understanding user needs to design solutions that improve interaction and maximize satisfaction. I strive to make users feel comfortable and satisfied.

Web.descripcion: Design and development of tailored websites to highlight your brand and achieve clear business goals.
items: Unique design: Websites tailored to your style and needs.
SEO optimization: Improve visibility from day one.
Scalable sites: Built to grow with your business.

ERP System.descripcion: I contributed to the development of an ERP system, tailoring it to the client's specific requirements to streamline internal processes.
items: Module development: Features designed for real business needs.
Efficient integration: Connects all system areas.
Agile collaboration: Team-driven development with efficient focus.

Mobile App.descripcion: I participated in building a mobile app for Ital Import, focused on improving their internal operations.
items: Intuitive design: Clear and user-friendly interface.
Core features: Inventory, orders, and more.

Ecommerce.descripcion: We build custom online stores designed for easy and secure product sales.
items: Attractive design: Aligned with your brand identity.
Payment gateways: Reliable and secure integrations.

items.descripcion: My experience as a developer and UX/UI designer
Client satisfaction is my focal point of excellence
PHP, JavaScript, MySQL, React, HTML, CSS, CodeIgniter...

relatos.texto: Collaborating with Medina on the Italian Import Racing app was exceptional. Her expertise in PHP and MySQL was key to creating an efficient online store. Her commitment and professionalism ensured the project's success.
Her work as a UX/UI designer, using Figma and Tailwind CSS, significantly impacted the user experience. Her user-centered solutions were key to the project's execution.
Working with Adeleina Medina and her expertise in PHP, JavaScript, and CodeIgniter was essential to improving our ERP system's functionalities. Highly recommended.

Adeleimar Medina optimized administrative processes in the company by implementing new modules in ProteoERP, improving inventory and billing management. Her experience in PHP and MySQL was key to the project's success.

Working with her was excellent. She developed the internal part of our mobile application, creating a fast and reliable system. Her commitment and professionalism were reflected in solutions tailored to our needs.

In the development of the Orion AutoCaress website, I coordinated the project and assigned Adeleimar as the technical guide for the backend team. Her leadership and creation of key functions were fundamental to the project's success.
